item.title: TUI Nav Theme
item.description:
A terminal-inspired Hugo theme with keyboard navigation.

Features

  • Keyboard-first navigation
  • Carousel view with 5-item window
  • Animated title letters
  • Built-in code highlighting
  • System monospace fonts
  • Dark terminal aesthetic

Tech Stack

  • Hugo static site generator
  • Vanilla JavaScript
  • CSS custom properties
  • Prism.js for syntax highlighting

Links

  • GitHub Repository
  • Documentation
